display_long_description:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

[media]


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

[media]


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

[media]



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

[media]



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

[media]











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.

**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75308617_1272215060801635_5042919391744431689_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=OedohYs_WpsQ7kNvwFklnLj&_nc_oc=Adn6Z_HeUV2WakHQFKaZ8RjMqpGokViAiY37FcqtMn4jr1VZWebuXD9j-az6JiGF2FA&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=k90fwAY12LAB3LIJBq2Jdg&oh=00_AfKoON-BQe08EW7_pNGFRu3MCWZXKsC2xd-J1xNJxBjLXQ&oe=682629DD)


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39001674_2499265186932117_1940974824575956372_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=r4giYs2oEkMQ7kNvwEx_YKL&_nc_oc=Adn_Lafpq_-0rQq54J0aXj4JlUmWw644g1WRZKvKWGYurh45raW78IQKj1plOgnWk3o&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=k90fwAY12LAB3LIJBq2Jdg&oh=00_AfJLlGXITk4A8vtdidBdqraa9rIO8WsS3taVEPktNAalFg&oe=682643D2)


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75375767_1695057634657861_9198351083050459907_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=rnsKzcZHmnIQ7kNvwEXGPY2&_nc_oc=AdnXAI3Z5jYF8A0x2LVvDaUb8v8N-BpwQ6a-VcqFr2t0hFrHWFulwHIh6hd7tsVHD4E&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=k90fwAY12LAB3LIJBq2Jdg&oh=00_AfJ7aFUeV9hoU2ddEDYEi2vUi8PGZJEl_2giPcnEBflHBg&oe=682649E3)



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031608_1046525513655988_8291945262237532410_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=RySL0HwyZj0Q7kNvwGf4lYv&_nc_oc=AdkRBtbo_g7Uk9ldtzrgoQe4nNPGjwIg5wEXCl2frMbbiFkZY-6l4Jyus97iYtJUby0&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=k90fwAY12LAB3LIJBq2Jdg&oh=00_AfKc8rzhhYEfpQDxFuRiFc8lPGNsSUVsF_iJtMyWX1c6UA&oe=6826406E)



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982508_850050307226020_5528409964007448806_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=6qkz5dyzixoQ7kNvwGmfu6A&_nc_oc=AdmJVKoXPuDB5mDnhZocD6zy0eisXn5wfMfYpxtNk4gPEjKsG1DN6tvt73wQTbgV2j4&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=k90fwAY12LAB3LIJBq2Jdg&oh=00_AfI99eonCldMYvpiNtvVNELsZezZjPNSrbJsYlAePPIDRw&oe=68264856)











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
